mapper.select: select r.reser_number, c.cafe_name, r.reser_time, r.reser_usertime, r.reser_price, TO_CHAR(r.reser_orderdate, 'MM-DD') as reser_orderdate, TO_CHAR(r.reser_date, 'MM-DD') as reser_date, r.reser_category, r.reser_person, r.reser_request, r.reser_status, r.member_id from reservation r, cafe c where r.cafe_id = c.cafe_id and r.member_id=#{member_id} order by r.reser_number desc
mapper.update: update reservation set reser_status='CANCEL' where reser_number=#{reser_number}
mapper.select: select count(*) from reservation where member_id =#{member_id}
